Session times

  • Day 3 Friday 10th September 2021. 00:00-02:00 (GMT/UTC+0)
  • Day 3 Friday 10th September 2021. 01:00-03:00 (BST/UTC+1)
  • Day 3 Friday 10th September 2021. 10:00-12:00 (AEST)

Session programme

The exact timings are to be advised, but we are pleased to have presentations from:

  • Korolik, Griffith University, Australia
  • Taradon Luangtongkum, Chulalongkorn University, Thailand
  • Maojun Zhang, Chinese CDC, China
  • Evangelos Mourkas / Ben Pascoe, Bath
  • Danielle Cribb, The Australian National University

See Registration session for information on how to connect.
